taglib.info: Tag library for MMBase based on MMCI(MMBase Cloud Interface).

tag.name: list
tag.info: The list tag provides a syntax to list objects managed by MMBase.

attribute.name: nodes
attribute.info: Comma-separated list of nodes, this attribute defines the starting point of the list. The parameter is equivalent to node.

attribute.name: node
attribute.info: Node number, or node alias. This attribute defines the starting point of the list.

attribute.name: type
attribute.info: A comma-separated list of NodeManagers and/or RelationManagers. The list forms a "chain of relations" examples "mags" "mags,news" or "mags,related,news" "mags,news,images" or "mags,related,news,related,images".

attribute.name: fields
attribute.info: Comma-separated list of fields that should be made available in the page. The fields are selected from attributes of the corresponding node managers defined in type. If the type fields contains more elements eq type="mags,news" then it is required to append a prefix to each field listed eq fields="mags.title,news.title".In the jsp page the values are available in form of Strings eq mags.title is available as mags_title and can be accessed using <%= mags_title >.

tag.name: head
tag.info: The tag can be used in a list to determine if this is the fist item in the list.

tag.name: tail
tag.info: The tag can be used in a list to determine if this is the fist item in the list.

tag.name: cloud
tag.info: The cloud tag initializes the cloud to use.

attribute.name: name
attribute.info: The name of the cloud eq "mmbase".

attribute.name: pwd
attribute.info: The password to use to logon to the cloud.

attribute.name: method
attribute.info:
How to get the authentication information. Can have the following values:
'http': will use http protocol to ask name and password from the user. If the 'logon' password is specified too, then logging on will fail if the user does not use that username. The 'pwd' attribute will be ignored.
'anonymous': Ignore the 'logon' attribute and create (or reuse) a cloud with an anonymous user
'asIs': Ignore the 'logon' attribute and reuse the cloud as it is in the session

attribute.name: authenticate
attribute.info: The authentitation module which must be used by the security system. The default is "name/password", which will do in most cases.

tag.name: mod
tag.info: This tag can be used to call features provided by Modules in MMBase.

tag.name: info
tag.info: This tag can be used to call getInfo from Module (can also be done with mod) and NodeManager.

attribute.name: type
attribute.info: A comma-separated list of NodeManagers and/or RelationManagers. The list forms a "chain of relations" examples "mags" "mags,news" or "mags,related,news" "mags,news,images" or "mags,related,news,related,images".

tag.name: field
tag.info: Gets the field 'name' from node 'node' (can also be list).

info.p: The 'id' of the node or list from which this field must be taken from.
On default this is the node or list which is enclosing this field.

attribute.name: name
attribute.info: The name of the field to get.

attribute.name: head
attribute.info: Like 'name', but does not return the value of the field, but the GUI-name of the field.

attribute.name: inverse
attribute.info: Inverse the sense of the condition.

attribute.name: list
attribute.info: The id of the list to which this condition must apply to. Default it it the enclosing one.
